title: Oce Normal New Champ Select
body: When will OCE have the New Champ Select in normals?  I am sick of calling lanes at the start of the lobby

replies.body: i kind of like blind picks, i can lock in like a *insert bad word here* if i want to play a particular champ or position. When I don't care about whatever position/champ ill sit and wait until everyone has picked their champs. It is frustrating not knowing what runes to run ( am i facing an ad or ap ) in a lane but also part of the fun.
